Paragraph p62: contains "коротышка" again, referencing another short person. Also mentions "другой коротышка". That includes a character mention. So all three paragraphs have character mentions.

We must ensure not to duplicate pointers already in recentEvidencePointers. Those are p54-p59, not these. So all three are new.
